title: No, Chrome OS isn’t removing Smart Lock, just tweaking it
content:
Recent reports have suggested that Chrome OS would be removing Smart Lock in the near future, but instead, Google is only tweaking the way it works, potentially to keep your account more secure.

more…

The post No, Chrome OS isn’t removing Smart Lock, just tweaking it appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Recent reports have suggested that Chrome OS would be removing Smart Lock, but Google is only tweaking how it works, to keep your account more secure.
